name: Dodo
description:
Dodo is a puzzle game where you discover the rules. You start with a keyboard, and some grids with symbols on. Typing in the correct 'words' will get the grid to the correct state.



Each level presents you with a grid with various symbols with it - you start out with just a 'lightning bolt' and a 'moon'. These symbols tell you something about the colors you have to get the grid to. What exactly do they tell you? Well, it's your job to figure out!

Each letter contributes to a word which changes the colours on the grid in a certain way - another puzzle for you to solve. Once you have figured out the meaning behind the letters and symbols, you can solve the tricky puzzles Dodo throws at you.

Solve harder puzzles as you explore your way through the world of Dodo!
